page.title: 04 SHOPPING FACILITIES
page.content: There are very few shopping facilities in this area. The reason for this is that the demand for such amenities is not great. In Crosshouse there are 8 shops and also a post office.These 8 shops are situated together in the centre of the town and so a small shopping centre for the villagers is formed.The shops include a supermarket and a chip shop as well as an off-licence. Gatehead is a very small community and therefore has virtually no shopping facilities.They have a post office which also acts as a general store where one can buy most of ones shopping.Springside has only 2 shops as well as a post office.The post office as in Gatehead, is also a general store.
